title: Failed to Redeem Permanent skin shard?
body:
I unlocked 3 skins to keep permanently but when i click "unlock skin permanent" it pops up with a redeem failed.
Now i cant unlock my skin shards and use them.

Anybody faced this?
Help please!{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey guys, I'm seeing quite a few reports on this and want to take a closer look to see if something's going on.  Were these skin shards all obtained from MSI capsules?  What shards are you attempting to reroll exactly?  Can I get a screenshot of this error popping up?

ICEKareem, I looked into this for you and see that you were able to reroll quite a lot of skins since yesterday.  The only inactive skin I see is for Super Kennen.  Is this still an issue?

Thanks!

Hey,

I've been crafting a few items aswell, Most of my rerolls turned into a permanent shard that couln't be redeemed. After a few tries, they finnaly did redeem. 
Some weird thing I noticed is that some skins take 2-4 tries to unlock. But a skin (Battlecast Relica Poppy) took my about 20 tries. 

The same message showing up as seen of one of the pics posted here. 

My Sincerely
MikoSlam <--- Dutchy (Don't blame my grammar)

>A view of my skins and champs which couldn't be redeemed.
 http://imgur.com/a/X8gQv
They are all redeemed now btw, after a few tries :)
That's great, thanks for all the info.  This looks to be an issue that's already under investigation!  In the meantime, it seems that spamming redemption has been serving as a workaround.  :x
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
http://imgur.com/PuntT10   http://imgur.com/DNWUDhA  there.

Thanks, that's great!  We're good on screenshots and info for now!  I've put up a [sticky post ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Z3zIAhas-8417-hextech-crafting-failed-to-redeem)where I'll be offering updates as they come.

So this is super late, but i just got chemtech tryndamere, and i was SUPER exited so i put essence into it then pressed "unlock permanently" and it said "REDEEM FAILED!
       you dropped in a shard, ect" and it said that all the servers were ok so i restarted my pc, and my league of legends client but it still doesn't work!!! please help!!!

UPDATE:
It works now XD

Please help me, i need my Omega Squad Veigar NOW
:(((((

yeah me too , MSI capsule Headhunter nidalee rerolled into perm wont unlock, I did it today if that's of any difference.

 Just tried a matter of seconds later and its working, would recommend people try again, been trying for hours and just worked.

Indeed, I see this was unlocked for you and is in your collections.  I'm curious if the failed to redeem is a display error.  Checking your collections might show the skin as unlocked despite the error messaging.

I rerolled 1 of many permanent shards, I did saw the message saying '**Skinname is now permanently unlocked an added to youre inv...** ' The shard didn't dissapear,  and my collection did not have the specific Item
I had a Whistler Village Twitch skinshard out of a MSI Capsule and it didnt work for a while aswell.{{champion:29}}
I realize this thread is kinda old but this is happening to me now was there a fix? I got infernal nasus in a chest and unlocked it but redeem fails.
This stupid shit is happening to me too... pls tell me how to fix.
Don't worry it's happening to me too. Actually that would be plenty of reason to worry, but fear not! I hear trying it over and over again works after a while.
Happening to me right now.  Bewitching morgana permanent, and can't redeem.  Tried it like 40 times and relog, nothing.   Guess i'll try later >.>

Ya i'm trying to make my Muay Thai Lee Sin skin added permanently to my collection, but i keep getting the redeem failed error. I've tried it over and over again, i would like to use the skin seeing as that Lee is my fav champ to play! D: If anything would fix it, please do tell! :D I got it from the purple lookin chest btw!

Also won't let me unlock a ward skin either... i'm getting annoyed.. If you put out a system that should work and be simple.. maybe it should work without stupid issues 24/7? :D
same I just got my Jhin shard unlocked and I can't permanently unlock it ...
same jayce shard

I have the same problem with 2 skinshards and 1 champshard but after retrying to activate the skin like 3 times after closing the client every time 1 skinshard worked but the others didnt... {{summoner:1}}
I just tried it again some times and it worked! I didnt have to restart the client.. Just try it some more times it may work randomly. {{summoner:13}}
It worked! Thx! I tried 25-30 in a row.
I forged a Wukong champ shard it used my blue essence but it didn't give me the champ and I already restarted my client 2 times but still didn't work PLS HELP!.
Thanks for fixing the problem, Riot. I feel so... noticed since u guys fixed the problem(or at least temporarily shut down the loot feature) 5 mins after my post.

Also having this problem, got a {{champion:134}}  champ shard this morning and trying on and off to unlock permanently. Hopefully it works soon, need more waifus for masteries {{champion:103}} {{champion:99}}
Update, finally worked, just logged in now and got it
I just got soul stealer Vayne from a chest, but when I try to unlock it it says that there's a problem and that I should try restarting the client. I did like 3 times but I still can't unlock it ):

nothing yet ? since yesterday i got this problem, i try it again this morning and nothing =/
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Have the same problem with atrox permanent champion shard ( atrox ) http://imgur.com/a/gGinP {{champion:266}}

Yea i got that too I got medieval twitch from a honour capsule and i dont have to use any essence but Im getting that pop up message...
this is happening to me aswell
The same problem is happening to me, I just got medieval twitch and twitch from an honor capsule, but I can't redeem Either of them, I've tried over 100 times.

Same :(( Just got BattleCast Cho'Gath skin from Hextech and spent 1520 essences just to receive the error message and tried 60 times (actually counted LOL), yet it shows in the near top right that the skin has been added to my inventory. Help?

Just dropped $20 in RP to get some stuff, managed to get Dj Sona and Pulsefire Caitlin in chests, but when i go to try to unlock it perminantly (1350 orange essence already paid) it gives me an error message, trying the 30-40 times as the "work-around" suggested with no luck. Am I to assume I'm never getting my Cait. skin?? #feelsbadman
i got this kind of thing too, i was so excited since i got Omega Squad Veigar but this thing is making me crazy

> [{quoted}](name=ICEKareem,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dgi6aIHe,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-04T11:43:08.323+0000)
>
> I unlocked 3 skins to keep permanently but when i click &quot;unlock skin permanent&quot; it pops up with a redeem failed.
> Now i cant unlock my skin shards and use them.
> 
> Anybody faced this?
> Help please!{{item:3070}}

Having exactly the same issue, 1 champ and 2 skins, make them permanent and it says "you drop a shard...etc" Server status says all is good as well. :(

I have the same problem with 1 skinshards..

Hazmat Heimerdinger

[Link img](https://ibb.co/mCsBak)

http://imgur.com/a/X8gQv
Same for me :/
I even can't get a ward skin.

Which ward skin is this for?  Are you receiving the error as well?  If you load up a custom game, are you able to locate the ward regardless of that error?  Sorry for all the questions, but it will help confirm some theories on this.  :D
[CLICK](http://imgur.com/a/Y1Bvu) As seen in the pictures I'm having the same problem. Hoping this is just a temporary thing.
Thank you!

Pretty annoying with the MSI capsules. Don't bother logging out, it's pointless and doesn't really do anything. What has worked for me (and I've had this problem for over 10 permanent skins) is to just spam it until it works. Usually not more than 5 to 10 attempts. Good luck peeps :)
I got the same problem aswell. Some skin shards just cant be unlocked because of this
SAME

Same with Champion Shards
{{item:3632}}
